model_answer: The correct answer is not provided in the options. Please listen carefully to the audio for the visual description during this portion of the tutorial.

The narrator instructs to select "OBS Camera" as the video source in Zoom. He also mentions going to OBS Settings > Audio and setting Monitoring to "Monitor and Output." However, he does not specifically mention selecting "Cable Output VB Audio Virtual Cable" or clicking on the Share Screen button. Therefore, the answer is (B).
